SEARCH
Package com.example.flashcardsystent.data

Class AppDatabase

java.lang.Object
androidx.room.RoomDatabase
com.example.flashcardsystent.data.AppDatabase
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppDatabase_Impl
public abstract class AppDatabase extends androidx.room.RoomDatabase
Room database singleton used throughout the app. Holds references to all DAOs and provides a global access point.
